page.title: 16CHILDREN'S RECREATION
page.content: At Carleton there is a park which includes swings, a slide and a climbing frame. After school we have many clubs to do with music and sport. The leisure centre nearest to Carleton is the Thornton Sports Centre. There are many activities including squash, tennis and gymnastics. There is a dancing centre at Carleton. You can take Tap, Ballet and Modern lessons. Dancing is a very expensive hobby, but it is very enjoyable. The most enjoyable free games seem to be Tig and Hide-and-Seek .These games have been played for many years. They both include running, and can be played at any time of the year.
